basics.name: Matt Selph
basics.label: Solutions Architect
basics.summary: Sr. Database Administrator and Cloud Architect with over a decade of experience in critical systems management including disaster recovery, high availability, tuning, and migration. Seeking a position designing cloud-based solutions. Skilled at interfacing with all levels of management up to and including C-level executives, and partnering with colleagues on cross-functional teams.

work.summary: Sr. Oracle DBA responsible for databases containing personnel records for all U.S. government employees and military members
highlights: Setup offsite disaster recovery solution using Oracle Recovery Mangaer with Realtime Apply

work.summary: Lead DBA responsible for 20 TB of classified and unclassified USAF data
highlights: Rebuilt classified systems in response to catastrophic failure
